intents.title: About Smart Academy
questions: What is Smart Academy?
Tell me about Smart Academy.
Can you explain what Smart Academy is?
Who runs Smart Academy?
Is Smart Academy a government initiative?
intents.answer: Smart Academy is an online learning platform developed by the ICT Authority to enable Kenyan citizens to access digital training.

intents.title: Target Audience
questions: Who should consider Smart Academy?
Who can benefit from Smart Academy?
Is Smart Academy for everyone?
Can I study from Smart Academy?
Is it open to the public?
Can youth access Smart Academy?
intents.answer: Anyone looking to improve their digital skills, including professionals, students, and public servants, can benefit from Smart Academy.

intents.title: Mobile Access
questions: Can I access Smart Academy on my phone?
Does Smart Academy work on smartphones?
Is the platform mobile-friendly?
Can I use a tablet or iPad for Smart Academy?
Can I learn on my laptop?
intents.answer: Yes, the platform is responsive and can be accessed on smartphones, tablets, and laptops.

intents.title: Course Levels Overview
questions: What are the course levels available?
Tell me about the different training levels.
What learning levels are provided at Smart Academy?
intents.answer: There are four course levels: 1) Foundational Digital Skills, 2) Basic Digital Skills, 3) Intermediate Digital Skills, and 4) Advanced Digital Skills.

intents.title: Foundational Digital Skills
questions: Tell me about foundational digital skills
What is a foundational course?
I have no experience in IT, where do I start?
Can I take a course without any experience?
Do you offer any foundational level courses?
What foundational courses do you offer?
Can you tell me your entry-level programs?
Which courses are suitable for someone new to Information Technology?
What can I start with if I have zero IT background?
intents.answer: The Foundational Digital Skills Curriculum is designed to empower individuals with basic knowledge to thrive in a digital world. Start your tech journey at https://www.smartacademy.go.ke.

intents.title: Foundational Course Units
questions: What units are in the foundational course?
Can you list the foundational topics?
What do I learn in the foundational course?
intents.answer: Units include Operating Digital Devices, Making Social Connections, Doing Business Online, Accessing Government Services, Cyber Hygiene, and eWaste Management. Learn more at https://www.smartacademy.go.ke.

intents.title: Basic Digital Skills
questions: Tell me about basic digital skills
Tell me about your basic courses.
What are your basic level courses?
Which basic IT Courses do you offer?
Are there any simple courses I can try?
What courses are available after Foundational level?
I have a little IT knowledge, which course should I take?
intents.answer: The Basic Digital Skills curriculum equips learners with essential skills for today's digital society. Topics include productivity tools, communication, government services, and more. Details at https://www.smartacademy.go.ke.

intents.title: Intermediate Digital Skills
questions: Do you have intermediate courses?
What comes after basic level?
What is taught at the intermediate level?
intents.answer: Intermediate courses at Smart Academy are designed for users who have foundational and basic skills. These include more advanced use of digital tools, data handling, and digital project management.

intents.title: Advanced Digital Skills
questions: Tell me about advanced digital skills
What advanced courses are available?
What is the difference between beginner and advanced courses?
How do I know if a course is advanced level?
Can I skip beginner courses and go straight to advanced?
Are advanced courses accredited?
intents.answer: Advanced courses are designed for learners seeking career-ready tech expertise. Topics include AI, Fintech, Cybersecurity, IoT, Data Analytics, and more. Visit https://www.smartacademy.go.ke for details.

intents.title: Advanced Course Details
questions: What are the requirements to enroll in an advanced course?
Do I need prior experience for advanced courses?
Can I join an advanced course mid-session?
Are advanced courses instructor-led?
How long do advanced courses take?
Are advanced courses online?
Are there projects in advanced courses?
Is tutor support available?
intents.answer: Advanced courses may require prior experience. They are offered online and include practical projects, instructor support, and run for 3 to 6 months depending on the course.

intents.title: Certification
questions: Will I get a certificate?
Do all courses offer a certificate?
Can I use the certificate for job applications?
When will I receive my certificate?
Do I pay for the certification?
Can I get a replacement certificate?
Is the certificate recognized?
Does the certificate have an expiry date?
intents.answer: Yes, you will receive a recognized digital certificate upon completion. It does not expire and can be used for job applications. Replacements can be requested if needed.

intents.title: Payment Process
questions: How do I pay for a course?
How can I make a payment?
What is the payment method?
Is payment done through eCitizen?
Do you accept bank transfers?
intents.answer: Payments are made through the eCitizen platform using Paybill number 222222. Account numbers are generated automatically per course during registration.

intents.title: Paybill & Account Details
questions: What is the Paybill number?
What is the Account Number?
Is the Paybill number available on the website?
Do I need a unique account number for each course?
What happens if I enter the wrong account number?
Can you send me the Paybill and Account details?
intents.answer: Use Paybill number 222222 on eCitizen. Account numbers are generated per course. Visit https://www.smartacademy.go.ke for payment help.

intents.title: Course Fees
questions: How much does a course cost?
Are there discounts available?
Is there a payment plan available?
Can I pay in installments?
Can I pay later and start now?
Do I get a receipt after payment?
Is there a refund policy?
What if I miss a payment?
intents.answer:
Course fees are as follows:
- Foundational: 500 KES
- Basic: 2,500 KES
- Intermediate: 5,000 KES
- Advanced: 12,000 KES

Pay via eCitizen using Paybill 222222.
